LanguageData.SPK_MakeSynthread.label: Make synthread
LanguageData.SPK_MakeSynthread.description: Weave synthread by working cloth into a complex lattice molecular structure.\n\nProduces 10 Synthread.
LanguageData.SPK_MakeHyperweave.label: Make hyperweave
LanguageData.SPK_MakeHyperweave.description: Weave hyperweave by bonding the molecules of devilstrand and plasteel into the ultimate textile.\n\nProduces 10 Hyperweave.
LanguageData.SPK_MakePlasteel.label: Make plasteel
LanguageData.SPK_MakePlasteel.description: Refine plasteel using steel and chemfuel.\n\nProduces 40 Plasteel.
LanguageData.SPK_MakeNeutroamine.label: Make neutroamine
LanguageData.SPK_MakeNeutroamine.description: Synthesise neutroamine using herbal medicine and psychoid leaves.
LanguageData.SPK_MakeNeutroamineBulk.label: Make neutroamine x4
LanguageData.SPK_MakeNeutroamineBulk.description: Synthesise neutroamine using herbal medicine and psychoid leaves.
LanguageData.SPK_MakeLuciferium.label: Make luciferium
LanguageData.SPK_MakeLuciferium.description: Create luciferium using neutroamine, psychoid leaves, plasteel and an advanced component.\n\n Produces 10 luciferium
LanguageData.SPK_MakeGlitterMed.label: Make glitterworld medicine
LanguageData.SPK_MakeGlitterMed.description: Create the best form of medicine typically found only on glitterworlds.
LanguageData.SPK_MakeGlitterMedBulk.label: Make glitterworld medicine x4
LanguageData.SPK_MakeGlitterMedBulk.description: Create the best form of medicine typically found only on glitterworlds.
